Name: Hexia
About the game: Hexia is a management game, where your task, as the King of the Realm you have been assigned, is to create and expand the territory, build new infrastructures and command and lead your people. You will face events that will present themselves to you as opportunities for improvement or as unexpected circumstances to overcome, and your choices will be fundamental to allow your kingdom to have the success it deserves and thus obtain a place in the world. The universe of Hexia is full of unexpected surprises and mysteries to be discovered. A deep and articulate story lurks behind every event , and every decision you make will have an impact on the continuation of the world’s plot, as well as the kingdom’s resources. The game is constantly evolving, starting from the humility of a single tile, each game has the potential to create an empire that will stand the test of time! Hexia is an immediate and intuitive game : explore, increase your wealth and your favor by creating a huge kingdom Each choice will have a real impact on the events that take place throughout the game . Helping nobles, imprisoning a witch or avoiding building better roads - your behavior will affect the outcome of the game Single player mode focused on managing your kingdom . Enjoy the events that will shape your new world The world of Hexia will offer you challenges ; it will be up to you to decide to complete them or let them slowly erode your empire Each game will never be the same as the previous one Game in constant development . Even though we are a small team of two, we believe in the work we do and take it seriously.
